index.headline: Pay once and <Styled>split</Styled> between the <Styled>rest</Styled> of the group
index.mock1Header: Easily manage balances in the group
index.mock1Text: Keep track of the balances of every group member and total value of transactions in the group.
index.mock2Header: Always know whose turn to pay it is
index.mock2Text: Use the roulette to find out whose balance is the lowest.
index.mock3Header: Submit splits to keep track of expenses
index.mock3Text: Easily split expenses between between its participants.
index.mock4Header: Update splits and see the individual updates
index.mock4Text: We all end up forgetting something.
index.mock5Text: Easily see individual balances and manage who can access and moderate the group.
